availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Duncan (Major, 13th KY Vol Infantry)

body.p: Campbellsville, Kentucky, tinner and soldier. Kentucky native. Tinner in Taylor County. Captain and Major in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 30, 1861 to June 12, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 855, 864; ibid., vol. 2, 919.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Taylor County, KY, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
